item.title: Introduction to Functional Programming in JavaScript (Part 2)
item.description: In part 1, we had learned about two important concepts in functional programming paradigm: immutable data and pure function.

item.title: Introduction to Functional Programming in JavaScript (Part 1)
item.description: Imperative programming is a programming paradigm that uses a sequence of statements to reach a certain goal.
